title: Web-Based Foreign Language Learning Design: Blended Courses for Beginners

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to comprehend basic foreign language vocabulary and expressions
context.additional_context: Integrated online-offline learning environment utilizing personal devices, including assessment systems for measuring learning motivation and outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize over 20 daily expressions through a beginner-level conversational module provided on a web-based platform.
Learners can perform simple conversations in the target language through role-playing with peers during weekly live video classes.
Learners can demonstrate beginner-level (A1) language proficiency through online quizzes and oral assessments at the end of the course.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
